pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Data Security at SilverLake Resort SilverLake HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy Matters at SilverLake Resort We take your privacy seriously at SilverLake Resort. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website and services. What Information Do We Collect? To provide you with the best experience, we gather various types of information, including personal details like your name and contact information, along with preferences to personalize your stay. We may also collect technical data like your IP address and browser type to help us improve our website. How Do We Use Your Information? We use your information to process reservations, manage your account, personalize website content, and send you important updates. We may also analyze user trends to make our website and services even better for everyone. Sharing Your Information We may share your information with trusted partners, like service providers who help us with reservations, to fulfill your requests and improve our services. We'll only share your data when necessary and always in accordance with the law or with your permission. Keeping Your Information Safe We use top-notch security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, changes, or leaks. However, no online transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure. We do our best to keep your information safe, but complete security can't be guaranteed. Your Privacy Rights You have control over your information! You can access, update, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also restrict how we use your information or object to certain uses. If you have any questions or want to exercise your rights, please contact us using the information below. Changes to This Policy We may occasionally update this privacy policy to reflect changes in the law or our practices. We'll always post any updates here, and for significant changes, we'll notify you directly. By using our website or services, you agree to the collection and use of your information as described in this policy. If you have any questions about this policy, feel free to contact us at silverlake@gmail.com. We're always happy to help! pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Policies of SilverLake Resort SilverLake HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Welcome to SilverLake Resort Welcome Aboard! These terms and conditions outline your experience with our website and the services we offer. By setting sail on our digital shores (accessing our website), you agree to follow these terms and our privacy policy. Booking Your Getaway Reservations made through our website depend on availability and confirmation. Payment methods and cancellation policies differ depending on your stay and will be clearly explained during the reservation process. Exploring Our Website We set course for a smooth journey! Agree to use our website for lawful purposes only, following these guidelines. Uncharted territories (prohibited activities) include violating laws, harming intellectual property rights, and unauthorized access or use. Treasures Await All the content on our website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, are precious finds belonging to SilverLake Resort or our partners (licensors). You can't take these treasures with you (use, reproduce, or distribute our content) without our permission first. Disclaimers and Waivers (Limitations of Liability) We strive to provide a reliable map (accurate and timely information), but we can't guarantee every detail on our website is a hidden cove waiting to be discovered (complete, reliable, or suitable for all). We are not responsible for any mishaps (damages) that may arise from your exploration (use) of our website or services. The Rules of the Land (Governing Law) These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disagreements arising under these terms will be settled in the courts of India. Changes to the Terms (Setting Sail with Updated Charts) We may update these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use our website after changes are posted, you agree to the new terms and set sail with our updated charts.
